department: ministry of foreign affairs, trade and development
short_summary: Cleaning and janitorial services for the embassy
description: The embassy of canada to switzerland, in bern, requires routine cleaning services and as and when required cleaning services within the premises and outside the chancery building. The property located on kirchenfeldstrasse 88, 3005 bern, switzerland. The total surface area of the mission is approximately 780 m2. The objective is to provide cleaning services for the embassy as per industry standards, thus, maintaining cleanliness and contributing to providing good working conditions for the occupants. The services required include cleaning the floors, windows, and furniture, as well as taking out the trash and recycling. The contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary equipment and supplies, as well as ensuring that all work is carried out in a safe and efficient manner.

full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### **Title and Reference**

Cleaning Services for the Embassy of Canada to Switzerland in Bern

Reference Number: CBS 74

Date of Publication: March 12, 2024

Status: This tender offer has expired.

### Tender Details

* Tender Number: 24-253012
* Tender Category: SRV - Services
* Currency: CAD
* Region: Worldwide (Delivery Location: Switzerland)
* Posting Date: March 12, 2024
* Closing Date and Time: 26 April 2024 14:00:00
* Estimated Contract Start Date: None
* Estimated Contract End Date: None

### Brief Description

The Embassy of Canada in Switzerland is seeking experienced service providers to carry out routine and "as and when required" cleaning services within the Mission premises and building.

The Chancery Building, with a total surface area of approximately 780 m2, is located at Kirchenfeldstrasse 88, 3005 Bern, Switzerland. The required cleaning services would involve meeting industry standards to ensure cleanliness and contribute to providing a pleasant working environment for Embassy staff.

### Tender Documents

To access the tender documents, please visit [Canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). The following documents are available for downloading:

* 24-253012 - bern - cleaning services - rfp.pdf
* 24-253012 - bern - cleaning services - addendum 1 0.pdf
* 24-253012 - bern - cleaning services - addendum 2 0.pdf
* 24-253012 - bern - cleaning services - addendum 3 0.pdf

### Contact Details
If you have any questions, concerns, or need further information, please contact:
 - Name: Nataliia Liu
 - Email: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca
 - Phone: (343) 203-0000

### Important Dates

* Closing Date and Time: 26 April 2024 14:00:00
* Estimated Contract Start Date: None
* Estimated Contract End Date: None

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
